item.title: This little-noticed update to Medicaid rules could burden seniors with thousands in medical debt
item.description: Seniors relying on Medicare escaped Trump’s big budget law mostly unscathed. Those on Medicaid may not.

item.title: Trump’s tariffs are back in court today: What to know.
item.description: Trade deals such as the U.S.-European Union agreement could be at risk from a case winding its way through courts in the U.S.

item.title: Will your spouse automatically inherit your 401(k)?
